member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_ID
member.summary: TheHTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_ID enumeration type defines service configuration options.

member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_ID.HttpServiceConfigIPListenList
member.summary: Specifies the IP Listen List used to register IP addresses on which to listen for SSL connections.

summary.div: Note If SSL is enabled in the HTTP Server API, TLS 1.0 may be used in place of SSL when the client application specifies TLS.

summary.para: Configures the HTTP Server API wide connection timeouts.
summary.div: Note Windows Vista and later versions of Windows
Note Windows Server 2008 R2 and Windows 7 and later versions of Windows.

summary.para: Specifies the SSL endpoint configuration with Hostname:Port as key. Used in the , , , and functions
summary.div: Note Windows 8 and later versions of Windows.

summary.para: Specifies that an operation should be performed for the SSL certificate record that specifies that Http.sys should consult the Centralized Certificate Store (CCS) store to find certificates if the port receives a Transport Layer Security (TLS) handshake. Used in the , , , and functions
summary.div: Note Windows 8 and later versions of Windows.

member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_ID.HttpServiceConfigMax
member.summary: Terminates the enumeration; is not used to define a service configuration option.
